title: Sri Lanka social media ban removed
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT –  Sri Lanka has removed a social media ban suddenly imposed in the early hours of Sunday ahead of planned nation-wide protests by activists.
Newswire.lk an internet portal said Sri Lanka’s Human Rights Commission had summoned the telecom regulator, Defence Secretary, Media and Information Secretary over the social media ban on Saturday
Sri Lanka imposed the social media ban in the early hours of Sunday. (Colombo/Apr02/2022)
